domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text:
@Adam_Creighton You really are grasping at straws.
Climate: decades of research and analysis and hypotheses and modelling and testing and refinement.
COVID19: a brand new disease.

Why trust an economics writer for Murdoch to make sense on scientific matters when we have actual scientists?
